name: Running out of space to help
name_original: Running out of space to help
description:
I did this game by myself, it is not what I wish I had achieved, however I have tried to do everything I could this week. I have tried to make all the assets myself, however due to lack of time I helped myself with the tools of the software used, a humanoid base skeleton and initial programming, hair, and the 3D model and textures that I made previously during two weeks (from my hands with my moles, bruises and veins). However, the rest I have done everything little by little in these long days.

Organize myself in the best way and record all my activities and times, save all the original and modifiable files to be able to show that I did everything.

I started with character design, modeling, hair, textures, clothes, style. Continue with history, dialogues, objectives, losses. Then I did the animations and performance of each character, some of them I recorded the voices (screaming like a gorilla for a whole hour). Then I started doing the 5 songs, thinking about the moment of battle, tranquility, after the battle, dance with my love and gameover (for which I played the piano a little but did not achieve a loop as I wanted).
